body.p:
Louisville Ky
To His Excellency Bariah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky --

-- Should it please your Excellency to make any change in the Tobacco Inspection of Louisville, We the undersigned would respectfully recommend to your Consideration, J. D. Appelgate, as one fully competent in every particular, to discharge the duties of Inspector, he having been engaged in the Ware Houses, for the last 20 Years, and is well Known to the Tobacco. Trade and Planters of Kentucky --

R Burge Manufacturer of tobacco at Louisville
Jas Peterson
Jas Clark Stemer of Tobacco (do)
